verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:12
verses.text: For if there be first a willing mind, it is accepted according to that a man hath, and not according to that he hath not.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:13
verses.text: For I mean not that other men be eased, and ye burdened:

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:14
verses.text: But by an equality, that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want, that their abundance also may be a supply for your want: that there may be equality:

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 8:15
verses.text: As it is written, He that had gathered much had nothing over; and he that had gathered little had no lack.
